subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In a messy shootout that finally ended when J.R. Smith hit a 3-pointer to take the lead for good, the Knicks fended off a challenge for the eighth position in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: In a messy shootout that finally ended when J.R. Smith hit a 3-pointer to take the lead for good, the Knicks fended off a challenge for the eighth position in the Eastern Conference.
